comments:
steps to reproduce:

   - create a list,
   - insert a data column to the detail row
   - map the list to the Java class attached

expected behavior:

   no exception thrown

actual behavior:

Created an attachment (id=30999)
the Java class

setVisibility and getVisibility where unsupported CSS actions. They are removed, use setVisibilityFormat(String) instead. To hide an element in PDF, use setVisibilityFormat("pdf") for example. It doesn't seem to work for html, but it's an underlying problem, since it doesn't work to hide elements in html using the UI either. I will file a bug on this if there isn't one already.
